attributes.action: make vandalising wikipedia a national sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Vandalisisn Wikipedia is fun! Making it a national sport will make sure that more people do it, exposing the flaw in the wiki model. Come on everyboy, make some vandalism.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
